summary: Nearly 100 DeFi-friendly WBTC have already been minted as TRC-20 tokens on Tron.
title: BitGo Launches Wrapped Bitcoin, Ether on Tron Blockchain
content: BitGo's Ethereum-based tokenized bitcoin project, Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC), has expanded to its second blockchain, Tron. The crypto custodian has also launched Wrapped Ether (WETH) on Tron as well.
